favourite.article: Trust Him! His heart is the only place of rest. Thank You Lord for drawing our heart into Your very self..where we can cast ALL our cares upon Thee..
Beautiful hymn. Thank you for sharing this!
This hymn is so fitting for the day we are living in, such an encouragement to trust Him. He is in control. HE DOES KNOW WHAT IS BEST...ALWAYS!

This song really lifts me, it brings a soft comfort and a sense of hope. It encourages my spirit. It is as if Jesus is speaking to us, reminding us to trust him till the storm of life is over, even till the trusting days are past. No matter what I am going to trust Him to the very end. Thank You Lord Jesus for the cross!
Hymns based on HIM always challenge, comfort, encourage, and stir us. A blessing when grounded in God's Word.
This song is a real encouragement for me and my family at the start of what will be a challenging year for us.
Faithful is He who calls you, who also will do it. ~ 1 Thes. 5:24
When I am totally lost for reasons, I love to sing this song.

I'm really touched by this hymn. Recently, I had been feeling slightly down, but I was fellowshipping with another member of the Body, and this song was mentioned! Praise the Lord! In everything, we just need to TRUST HIM - even if we're feeling uncertain about something, we just need to turn to Him and live according to faith, trusting Him! After listening to this song countless times, it still enlightens me and encourages me to keep on trusting Him no matter what goes on in our lives! Lord Jesus, keep us trusting in You through faith! :)
This new melody to this classic tune always gets me to my spirit!
